recipe.ingredients: - cucumber: 1 large - hummus: 1 cup - cherry tomatoes: 1/2 cup (halved) - black olives: 1/4 cup (sliced) - fresh parsley (chopped): 2 tablespoons
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Cucumber: Wash and slice the cucumber into 1/2-inch thick rounds. 2. Assemble Bites: Spread a spoonful of hummus on each cucumber slice. Top each with a halved cherry tomato and a few olive slices. 3. Garnish: Sprinkle chopped parsley over the assembled cucumber bites for an added burst of flavor. 4. Serve: Arrange the cucumber bites on a platter and serve immediately or chill in the refrigerator before serving.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 20g, Dietary Fiber: 5g, Sodium: 600mg, Saturated Fat: 1g, Total Fat: 12g, Protein: 6g, Total Sugars: 5g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 435 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Cucumber: 45 calories for 1 large cucumber Hummus: 355 calories per cup Cherry Tomatoes: 16 calories per 1/2 cup Black Olives: 30 calories per 1/4 cup Fresh Parsley: Negligible - Serving People: 4
